item.title: Pok√©mon Legends Z-A‚Äôs Small, Boring Map Is Leaving Fans Disappointed
item.content:encoded:
Pok√©mon Legends Z-A, the newest entry in the long-running Nintendo RPG franchise, is officially out today on Switch and Switch 2. Over on the Pok√©mon subreddit, a popular post with over 3,000 upvotes claims that you can walk around the entire city in less than seven minutes. On Reddit and YouTube, you can find comments from players lamenting the small map‚Äôs lack of visual variety. For a franchise that used to be about discovering new cities, towns, biomes, and environments, Z-A‚Äòs focus on one city, filled with reused buildings and props, is disappointing to many.
